main event: A Civil Defense director in Baltimore, Maryland reported seeing a round, bright white object hovering and pulsing in the sky for 15 minutes on March 6, 1954.
interesting points: The object was visible in the northeast sky of Orangeville, Maryland.
The observer used both the naked eye and binoculars to watch the object.
The object hovered and pulsed in the sky for 15 minutes.
The report concludes that the object was possibly a light reflection from the city of Baltimore.
An aircraft was also spotted in the area during the sighting.
witnesses: A Civil Defense director in Baltimore, Maryland
photographs: No photographs were included in the report
